title: The natural logarithm on complex numbers (extension)

blocks.name: logcxp0
blocks.content: Logarithm of a complex power. Generalization of ~ logcxp . (Contributed by AV, 22-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm logcxp0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0)), crn(clog))), wceq(cfv(clog, co(c0, ccxp, c1)), co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0))))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(clog, co(c0, ccxp, c1)), co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0)), cfv(clog, cfv(ce, co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0)))), w3a(wcel(c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0)), crn(clog))))
  fveq2d(clog, co(c0, ccxp, c1), cfv(ce, co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0))), w3a(wcel(c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0)), crn(clog))))
  cxpefd(c0, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0)), crn(clog))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0)), crn(clog)), wcel(c0, cc))
  eldifi(c0, cc, csn(nat0))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0)), crn(clog)), wne(c0, nat0))
  eldifsni(c0, cc, nat0)
  simp2(wcel(c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0)), crn(clog)))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0)), crn(clog)), wceq(cfv(clog, cfv(ce, co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0)))), co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0))))
  logef(co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm logcxp0(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 })∧ c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1[×](log ` c0))∈ ran(log))→(log `(c0[^c]c1))=(c1[×](log ` c0)))
} = {
  eqtrd((log `(c0[^c]c1)), (c1[×](log ` c0)), (log `(exp `(c1[×](log ` c0)))), (c0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 })∧ c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1[×](log ` c0))∈ ran(log)))
  fveq2d(clog, (c0[^c]c1), (exp `(c1[×](log ` c0))), (c0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 })∧ c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1[×](log ` c0))∈ ran(log)))
  cxpefd(c0, c1, (c0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 })∧ c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1[×](log ` c0))∈ ran(log)))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), c1 ∈ ℂ, (c1[×](log ` c0))∈ ran(log), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  eldifi(c0, cc, { 0 })
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), c1 ∈ ℂ, (c1[×](log ` c0))∈ ran(log), c0 ≠ 0)
  eldifsni(c0, cc, nat0)
  simp2(c0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), c1 ∈ ℂ, (c1[×](log ` c0))∈ ran(log))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), c1 ∈ ℂ, (c1[×](log ` c0))∈ ran(log), (log `(exp `(c1[×](log ` c0))))=(c1[×](log ` c0)))
  logef((c1[×](log ` c0)))
}

blocks.name: regt1loggt0
blocks.content: The natural logarithm for a real number greater than 1 is greater than 0. (Contributed by AV, 25-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm regt1loggt0(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(clog, c0)))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(clog, c0)), wbr(nat1, clt, c0))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wcel(c0, cr))
  bitr4d(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(clog, c0)), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(cfv(clog, nat1), clt, cfv(clog, c0)))
  breq1d(nat0, clt, cfv(clog, c0), cfv(clog, nat1), wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wceq(nat0, cfv(clog, nat1)))
  eqcomi(nat0, cfv(clog, nat1))
  log1()
  sylancr(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wb(wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(cfv(clog, nat1), clt, cfv(clog, c0))), wcel(nat1, crp), wcel(c0, crp))
  1rp()
  3imtr4i(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wcel(c0, crp), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  imdistani(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  mpani(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, nat1))
  0lt1()
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cr), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, nat1), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  0red(wcel(c0, cr))
  1red(wcel(c0, cr))
  id(wcel(c0, cr))
  lttr(nat0, nat1, c0)
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0))), wcel(nat1, cxr))
  1xr()
  elioopnf(nat1, c0)
  elrp(c0)
  logltb(nat1, c0)
}
